remarks.format: ## Remarks 是基于文件系统中的单一日志文件的记录序列。The is a record sequence based on a single log file in the file system. 它是 接口在基于简单文件的日志之上的简单实现。It is a simple implementation of the interface, on top of a simple file-based log. 若要操作基于文件的日志，运行应用程序时使用的帐户必须具有足够的特权，这与构造 时文件系统安全性所规定的要求是相同的。To manipulate a file-based log, the account that your application is running in must have sufficient privileges, as dictated by the file system security at the time the is constructed. 此外，在构造时要发出 FullTrust 请求。In addition, a demand for FullTrust is made at construction time. 此后，要对权限验证结果进行缓存，以便与 Windows 安全模式保持一致。The permission verification results are cached thereafter in keeping with the Windows security model. 应该确保您没有意外地向未授权用户公开记录序列的内容。You should ensure that you do not accidentally expose the contents of the record sequence to an unauthorized user. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个记录序列，向该序列追加记录，最后读取这些记录。The following example creates a record sequence, appends record to it, and finally reads the records.
